skill.name: micro-skill-creator
skill.description: Rapidly creates atomic, focused skills optimized with evidence-based prompting, specialist agents, and systematic testing. Each micro-skill does one thing exceptionally well using self-consistency, program-of-thought, and plan-and-solve patterns. Enhanced with agent-creator principles and functionality-audit validation. Perfect for building composable workflow components.

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill containing only markdown templates and guidelines for creating micro-skills. No executable code, no file system access, no network calls, no external command execution. Contains only evidence-based prompting methodology documentation.

content.user_title: Create atomic AI skills with specialist agents
content.value_statement: Building composable AI skills requires structured methodology and evidence-based patterns. This skill provides templates and workflows for creating focused micro-skills that spawn specialist agents optimized for specific tasks using validated techniques.
actual_capabilities: Create atomic skills with single responsibility using structured templates
Design specialist agents with evidence-based prompting patterns (self-consistency, program-of-thought, plan-and-solve)
Define explicit input/output contracts for reliable composition
Set up validation test cases and failure mode handling
Enable neural training integration for continuous improvement
Compose skills into cascade workflows and slash commands
limitations: This is a skill creation tool, not an executor - it generates skill definitions for you to use
Created skills require integration with Claude Code or compatible platform
Specialist agent behavior depends on the AI model and implementation details

use_cases.title: Build reusable skill libraries
use_cases.description: Create standardized micro-skills for consistent quality across projects and teams

use_cases.title: Design domain-specific agents
use_cases.description: Build specialist agents optimized for specific domains like data extraction or validation

use_cases.title: Compose cascade pipelines
use_cases.description: Chain atomic skills into sequential, parallel, or conditional workflows

prompt_templates.title: Code generation skill
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a generation micro-skill that produces code artifacts using plan-and-solve framework with comprehensive error handling

prompt_templates.title: Analysis pipeline
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an analysis micro-skill that combines program-of-thought and self-consistency for security scanning with training integration

output_examples.input: Create a micro-skill that validates JSON against a schema using program-of-thought patterns
output: Purpose: Validate JSON data against JSON Schema specifications with detailed reasoning
Output: validation result with violations, confidence scores, suggested fixes
Agent type: Validation specialist using program-of-thought decomposition
Test cases: Valid input, invalid types, missing required fields, edge cases

best_practices: Keep each micro-skill to a single responsibility with a clear one-sentence purpose
Define explicit input/output contracts with validation rules and quality standards
Include failure mode awareness with detection and mitigation strategies
anti_patterns: Creating skills with multiple unrelated responsibilities (violates atomic design principle)
Over-engineering with excessive abstraction layers that reduce clarity
Building tightly coupled skills that cannot function independently

faq.question: What is a micro-skill versus a regular skill?
faq.answer: Micro-skills are atomic, single-responsibility skills optimized for composition. They spawn specialist agents using evidence-based patterns.

faq.question: Which platforms support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude Code, Claude, and Codex platforms that support skill definitions with YAML frontmatter.

faq.question: How complex can a micro-skill be?
faq.answer: Keep skills focused on one task. Complex workflows should be composed from multiple simple micro-skills working together.

faq.question: How long does it take to create a micro-skill?
faq.answer: Using the provided templates, basic micro-skills can be defined in minutes. Complex skills with validation may take longer.

faq.question: How do I integrate created skills?
faq.answer: Skills are saved to the skills directory and become available to Claude Code. Use slash-command-encoder for command access.

faq.question: How does this differ from agent-creator?
faq.answer: Agent-creator creates standalone agents. Micro-skill-creator creates composable skill units optimized for cascade workflows.
